title: Microsoft | SWE1 (L60) | India
content:
Education: B.Tech in CS (Tier 1)
Years of Experience: 2
Prior Experience: SE at product based startup
Current Compensation: 27.5 LPA
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Software Dev. I (L60)
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: INR 24 LPA
Signing Bonus: INR 7L
Stock bonus: $60K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year 

Benefits: Usual MS Benefits

title: Salesforce SMTS | PhonePe | Bangalore
content:
I have two competing offers. Please help me choose one!
Years of Experience: 5 years

Company: Salesforce
Team: Data cloud
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 5500000 INR
Relocation/Signing Bonus: NA
Stock bonus: 80K USD over 4 years
Performance Bonus: 15% of Salary ( 832500 )
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 7740000(considering 10% performance bonus)

Company: PhonePe
Team: Growth and Monetisation
Title/Level: Software Engineer(Flat heirarchy)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 5500000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 600000
Stock bonus: 6500000 INR ESOPs over 4 years
Performance Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 7725000(7125000 next year onwards)
I have been told that instead of performance bonus, PhonePe gives ESOPs topup.

I'm thinking about WLB, PhonePe's IPO, etc.

title: Amazon | System Development Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: BE in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: SDET at Comcast
Previous compensation: 11 LPA

Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: System Development Engineer L4
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 20 LPA
Relocation: 1L
Signing Bonus: 4L for First Year, 3.2L for Second Year
Stock bonus: 80 RSUs(Approx 12L) vested over 4 years, RSU vesting cycle(5%,15%,40%,40%)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~24.6 LPA
Benefits: 15 Annual leaves + 12 sick leaves+ 12 Casual leaves + Other Amazon benefits

title: BicycleAI | SDE 2 Frontend developer
content:
Education: Tier-3 college
Years of Experience: 4.5+ years (excluding internships)
Prior Experience: SDE-1 at a product based company
Previous compensation: 24.5 LPA (all fixed)

Company: BicycleAI
Title/Level: SDE-2 (Frontend)
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 29 LPA 
Relocation: 1 lakh
Retention: 2 lakhs
Stocks: 10  lakhs for 4 years -> 2.5 lakh per annum
Benefits: Internet reimbursement.
Total comp (Salary + relocation + retention + Stock): = 34.5 LPA

Rejected the offer as base salary jump was very low compared to previous compensation. 
It was a good interview experience though.

title: Google L4 vs Rubrik G6
content:
Education: M.Tech from Tier 1
Years of Experience: ~3 years
Previous TC: INR 39,00,000

Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Rubrik
Title/Level: G6
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 45,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5,40,000
Stock bonus: 3900 units (~ $30/unit) 25% each year
Bonus: 15% (6,75,000)
Total comp 1 year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 81,50,000
2nd year onwards: 76,10,000

Date of the Offer: June
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 37,60,000
PF: 1,80,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 5,50,000
Stock bonus: 92K USD (38%, 32%, 18%, 12%)
Bonus: 15% (5,64,000)
Total comp 1 year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 79,50,000
2nd year: 69,40,000

which one to choose?
